llm.feedback:
The 4‑line movers & scenarios are fine, but the swing‑trade line must be reformatted: use a proper horizon window (e.g., 2025‑09‑01 to 2025‑09‑30), swap the “Invalidation” and “Trigger” fields (trigger = Fed minutes confirm cut; invalidation = Fed minutes show no cut, steepening curve), drop all parentheses and citations from the trade line, and keep the probability and confidence as plain numbers (70 % | 80). Remove the stray “Main‑focus check:” block and any trailing commentary after the trade line. The resulting trade line should read:  

**Up | 2025‑09‑01 to 2025‑09‑30 | 96.0 | 95.5 | 97.5 | 2:1 | Fed minutes show no cut, steepening curve | Fed minutes confirm cut | 70 % | 80**.
